title: The Greeks Crucible of Civilazation pt 3
description:
The Greeks: Crucible of Civilazation Part 3 of 3 The Collapse of Confidence (narrator - Liam Neeson)

The conclusion to this great series. enjoy.
Part 1 can be found on Demonoid


Note: for all those interested in more details on the battles, weapons and statistics, i highly recommend the documentary at&#039;last stand of the 300&#039; History channel. i don&#039;t know if its still going.

New docs on demonoid on this topic are:
TTC The Peloponnesian War Kenneth Harl (mp3 presentation)
History Channel Rise and Fall of Sparta (video)
